fastformat::sinks::ff_FILE_sink

ff_FILE_sink Class Reference

#include <fastformat/sinks/FILE.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Utility class that allows a standard C stream - stdout, stderr - to be passed as a sink.

Public Member Functions

 ff_FILE_sink (FILE *stm)
 Constructs an instance of the sink from a FILE* variable.

Public Attributes

FILE *const stream
 The underlying FILE* stream.
